entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzers are tied to `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web` making them unavailable in ASP.NET Core library projects #50414
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting perf counters are slow #50412
  • FromQueryAttribute with Name does not work when added to property of an object with AsParametersAttribute #50408
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #50405
  • Blazor dotnet 8 preview 7 - Unexpected IDisposable.Dispose() #50404
  • Test crash in Libuv.FunctionalTests on (Alpine.314.Amd64.Open)Ubuntu.2004.Amd64.Open in 6.0 #50403
  • Add validation to test that OOB packages have no SharedFx-only references #50402
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Make PropertyNameCaseInsensitive available for JSON->gRPC transcoding #50401
  • Kestrel HTTPS: Incorrect behavior when missing access to private key on Windows #50400
  • Dockerise ASP.NET Core app with Alpine image #50399
  • Endpoint information available before calling UseRouting() #50393
  • it is possible to use the [Authorize] attribute in Blazor controllers #50392
  • Templates for previous frameworks are not available on .NET 8 (nightly) rc builds #50390

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger Package Version #50176
  • Components E2E failure - error EnableGenerateDocumentationFile #49960
  • restore failed, error CS9057: Analyzer assembly #49658
  • Memory Leak on .Net 7 but not 6 #50097
  • Leading @ should not be required in attribute value when specifying render mode using @rendermode #49443
  • Differential response mechanism for Blazor enhanced navigation, utilizing a configurable page store. #50329
  • Quarantine CanStartAndStopConnectionUsingGivenTransport #49315
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50157
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix typo in method name StopTrasnsportTracking -> StopTransportTracking #50416
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-runtime
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview4 #50415
    area-infrastructure
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr
  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr
  • Fix local build file modification #50387
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50386
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Revert "[automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' (#50281)" #50406
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Don't display the reconnection dialog after an error occurs #50381
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix error message in CodeCheck file #50375
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    area-networking, area-routing, 8.0-rc2
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23421.9 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2255272 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, .NET 8 Planning
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
